@xXCrazyjayXx Actually netorare is having the first character introduced / MC (or at least the implied MC) having a loved one stolen but it can also be the MC being stolen for instance https://nhentai.net/g/271797/ is a typical netorare of the MC being stolen in this case the wife is the MC or this one where a guy is stolen https://nhentai.net/g/241032/. Netori on the other hand is where the MC is the one doing the stealing, often from unlikable/bad ppl like in this one https://nhentai.net/g/110780/ it is even named as netori but tagged as netorare on here, in it the first character introduced/mc goes on to "steal" women.
